meanings.sent1: I tried to clean the smudges off the window.

meanings.definition: To make or become smeared or blurred.
meanings.sent1: Be careful not to smudges the ink while writing.
meanings.sent2: The rain smudges the ink on the paper, making it illegible.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy smudges the paint on the wall with its tail.
meanings.sent4: Time smudges the memories, making them fade away.
meanings.sent5: The artist gently smudges the charcoal to create shadows in the drawing.
